name: The Curse of the Snowman
description:
Oh crap!, you've been cursed and turned into a Snowman! find the hearts scattered all over the level to become a human kid again. Also collect a lot of snow because climatechangeandallthat you're melting LIKE RIGHT NOW, so grab that sweet snow to keep you from shrinking. And get to know the poor souls stuck in this maze with you, they seem friendly.

Silly gamejam game made as the first assignment for the Game Programming course at Humber. We used Unreal, lots of blueprints, custom meshes, homemade music and a lot of github errors. The lovely people that participated in this are:

Patrick Ha Jin Kim//Programmer

Antonio Shaw//Level Designer

Devon Richards//Music and sounds

Luiz Petribu//Programmer

Marcos Contreras//User interface and experience

Taucia LeClair//3D modelling

Ariel Quinteros//Leader and Lead programmer.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Collect snow: J
  • Pause menu: P

It also supports controllers, I tested it with an Xbox One Controller, but it should work with any pc controller.
